Write-Up Text: People took to social media to discuss Australian politics economics and society. Some posts highlighted the benefits of the energy plan by @AlboMP government in reducing energy bills for households and businesses. Others questioned the effectiveness of government policies including the Women's Taskforce recommendation on Sole Parents Payments and Medicare overhaul in the upcoming budget. Conversations on Australia's energy industry poverty and billionaire wealth were also prominent while some posts suggest exciting things to come in 2023 Federal Budget.
